extension.name: DIASHOW4 Modul
extension.author: Ralf weber
extension.description: DiaShow4 Module - © 2009 by Ralf Weber - LoadBrain

field.name: hint
field.default: All pictures must have the same height and width!
field.label: IMPORTANT HINT
field.description: The width of the slideshow container (implied in px). Set it to accommodate the largest image within the slideshow

field.name: slideshow_width
field.label: width of the slideshow
field.description: All pictures must have the same height and width!

field.name: slideshow_height
field.label: height of the slideshow
field.description: All pictures must have the same height and width!

field.name: hintHeight
field.label: The heigth of the hint for the text
field.description: The heigth of the hint for the text

field.name: delay
field.label: Delay between image change, in milliseconds (ie: 3000 = 3 seconds)
field.description: Delay between image change, in milliseconds (ie: 3000 = 3 seconds)

field.name: optionalRandomOrder
field.label: Show pictures in random order
field.description: An optional parameter specifying whether to randomize the display order of the images. Set it to R to randomize, or remove this parameter (unset) to not.

field.name: showIt
field.label: Show the image in full size on triggering mousewheel while mouseover?

field.name: xPos
field.label: The xpos of the full image relative to the container
field.description: The xpos of the full image relative to the container

field.name: yPos
field.label: The ypos of the full image relative to the container
field.description: The ypos of the full image relative to the container

field.name: height
field.label: The height of the full image
field.description: The heigth of the full image

field.name: width
field.label: The width of the full image
field.description: The width of the full image

field.name: borderCss
field.label: The css for the hint to view the full image
field.description: The css for the hint to view the full image
